title: Stage Lv4-A4-S14
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I greatly appreciate your assistance. (business variant 1)
I have received your email. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I greatly appreciate your assistance. (business variant 1)
I have received your email. (business variant 1)
I have confirmed what you mentioned. (business variant 1)
Thank you for your prompt response. (business variant 1)
I would like to confirm that I have understood correctly. (business variant 1)
I have reviewed your proposal. (business variant 1)
Thank you for clarifying that. (business variant 1)
All details have been confirmed. (business variant 1)
I appreciate you taking the time. (business variant 1)
The information you requested has been prepared. (business variant 1)
